Talent.Name: "I'd Rather Lose Money Myself..."
Talent.Desc: Each time your opponent gains 2 Elemental Dice during this Round, you gain 1 $[K411]. (Elemental Die provided by this effect are excluded)

K411.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>
K411.Desc: The {SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element can be considered as any kind of element, and can be used to pay for costs of various kinds.
